1.content: Integrate Stripe Payment System for FindBrexit Consultants Platform
1.details: Add complete Stripe payment processing for subscription plans (Starter £29/month, Professional £99/month) including payment forms, subscription management, webhooks, and billing portal access.

2.content: Setup Stripe Products and Pricing in Stripe Dashboard
2.details: Create corresponding products and recurring price objects in Stripe for all subscription tiers: Starter (£29/month), Professional (£99/month), and any other plans found in the application.

3.details: Add Stripe Checkout sessions for subscription sign-ups with 14-day free trial, upgrade/downgrade functionality, promotional pricing support, and payment processing with proper success/cancel page handling.

4.details: Create customer portal access, billing history, payment method management, plan changes, and subscription cancellation functionality.

5.details: Set up Supabase Edge Functions to handle Stripe webhooks for subscription events (created, updated, cancelled, payment succeeded/failed) to keep local database in sync.

6.content: Add Payment Security & User Experience Enhancements
6.details: Implement proper error handling, loading states, payment confirmation messages, trial period messaging, and security measures for PCI compliance.
